name: Kade Rivera
core_wound: Was a medic in corporate military service, saw horrors, turned to drugs to cope, dishonorably discharged, lost everything
wants: Just to get through each day without too much pain
needs: To find something worth staying sober for, to believe he can still help people
voice_markers: Gallows humor, dark jokes about death
Military slang mixed with street talk
Calls people 'kid' even when they're not much younger
contradiction: Cynical and world-weary but secretly still cares deeply about people, acts like he's given up but keeps helping Nico
physical_description: Latino, weathered face, old military tattoos fading on arms, walks with slight limp from old injury, surprisingly steady hands despite drug use
skills: Drug chemistry knowledge - knows how to cut and test substances
flaws: Heavy Veil addiction, worse than Nico's
Suicidal ideation he masks with humor
Difficulty forming attachments - everyone he cared about died
knowledge_state_book1_start: Drug trade at higher level than Nico
Some upper-tier contacts from military days
Medical knowledge useful for treating ODs

relationships.Nico Chen: Business partner and closest thing to a friend, protective of him in subtle ways
relationships.Maya Torres: Dislikes her do-gooder attitude, but respects her for not giving up on Nico
relationships.Old military contacts: Complicated - some will help for money, others want him dead
relationships.Level 8 community: Respected for medical help he provides
